description: Hospitalization for appendix surgery at Apollo Hospital. Total medical expenses incurred were ₹45,000 including surgery, medicines, and room charges.
Minor accident on highway resulting in front bumper damage and headlight replacement. Vehicle towed to authorized service center.
Lost baggage during international flight. Baggage contained personal items, electronics, and clothing worth approximately ₹8,000.
Emergency treatment for food poisoning at local clinic. Medicines and consultation fees included in the claim amount.
